languages.text: "Кунрад Войгтвир... Он заработал себе уже несколько смертных приговоров. В этот раз он не улизнет от правосудия".
languages.translation_comment: The party thinks they are about to capture Voigtvir - they are walking into Achilleas's trap at the start of Chapter 3.

languages.text: "Kunrad Voigtvir... He has earned himself multiple death sentences by now. He won't escape justice this time."
languages.translation_comment: The party thinks they are about to capture Voigtvir - they are walking into Achilleas's trap at the start of Chapter 3.

languages.text: 「クンラッド・ボイトヴィル…彼は今や何度も死刑判決を受けている。今回は正義から逃れられないだろう」
languages.original_text: "Kunrad Voigtvir... He has earned himself multiple death sentences by now. He won't escape justice this time."

traits.locale_text: 「クンラッド・ボイトヴィル…彼は今や何度も死刑判決を受けている。今回は正義から逃れられないだろう」

languages.text: "Kunrad Voigtvir ... Er hat mittlerweile mehrfach die Todesstrafe verdient. Diesmal wird er seiner gerechten Strafe nicht entgehen."
languages.original_text: "Kunrad Voigtvir... He has earned himself multiple death sentences by now. He won't escape justice this time."

traits.locale_text: "Kunrad Voigtvir ... Er hat mittlerweile mehrfach die Todesstrafe verdient. Diesmal wird er seiner gerechten Strafe nicht entgehen."

languages.text: «Kunrad Voigtvir... Se ha ganado numerosas sentencias de muerte. Esta vez no escapará a la justicia».
languages.original_text: "Kunrad Voigtvir... He has earned himself multiple death sentences by now. He won't escape justice this time."

traits.locale_text: «Kunrad Voigtvir... Se ha ganado numerosas sentencias de muerte. Esta vez no escapará a la justicia».

languages.text: “昆拉德·维特威尔……到目前为止，他犯下的罪行已经足够枪毙好几次了，这次他别想逃脱正义的制裁。”
languages.original_text: "Kunrad Voigtvir... He has earned himself multiple death sentences by now. He won't escape justice this time."

traits.locale_text: “昆拉德·维特威尔……到目前为止，他犯下的罪行已经足够枪毙好几次了，这次他别想逃脱正义的制裁。”

languages.text: "Kunrad Voigtvir... Kendisinin infaz edilmeyi bekleyen birden fazla ölüm cezası mevcut. Bu sefer adaletten kaçamayacak."
languages.original_text: "Kunrad Voigtvir... He has earned himself multiple death sentences by now. He won't escape justice this time."

languages.text: « Kunrad Voigtvir... Ce criminel mérite plusieurs condamnations à mort. Il n'échappera pas à la justice, cette fois. »
